OrgName.entry: AGE CONCERN SHEFFIELD - 1 TO 1 PRACTICAL SUPPORT

Desc.entry: A chargeable service designed to provide practical assistance to allow people to continue to live in their own home, available to anyone aged 50 years and over, including those in receipt of direct payments, who need help with everyday practical tasks. The support package is tailored to the individuals needs via support planning. Support can include; help with meeting up with friends or family, getting out to the shops, traveling to appointments, using public transport, buying equipment clients may need, dealing with correspondence, de-cluttering, caring for pets (including a dog walking service), help to cook meals, help entertaining others and shopping for gifts and cards etc. This flexible support can be purchased in 2 hour packages , either for a one off event or on a regular basis. Please contact for further information. A registered charity and company limited by guarantee no 5207254
